description: Female figure wearing layered robes. Outermost robe features design of wheels over a blue and white ground with ferns. Undergarments are red, green, and ochre.
dimension:
31 1/2 x 11 7/16 in. (80 x 29 cm) (image)
66 1/8 x 15 3/4 in. (168 x 40 cm) (mount) W 45 cm w/roller
medium: Ink, color, gold, and shell white on paper
signed: Nihon giga (\'pleasure painting\') Kaigetsudo_ zu shi
title: Standing Prostitute in Kimono with Fern and Wheel Pattern
